allegro5

init
Initiates allegro Temporarily, this function installs and inits a whole bunch of stuff.

rest
This is recommended to call regularly, it helps making your program run more smoothly on some systems.

Functions

init

function init ()

Initiates allegro Temporarily, this function installs and inits a whole bunch of stuff.  That’s why mouse and keyboard among other things don’t have init/install functions, yet.

current_time

function current_time ()

Returns

Current time.

rest

function rest (t)

This is recommended to call regularly, it helps making your program run more smoothly on some systems.  Parameters: t - Time to rest.
